channel.title: Help with cc glitch please
channel.description:
Okay, so in a server i play there's this glitch where it will automatically put you into the "Market" clan chat without you doing anything. You login on the server, and it automatically puts you into the "Market" clan chat, you cannot talk because it say's you're not in it, When you try to leave it says "You're not in a clan", when you join it, everything everyone says is either double or more. The owner cannot figure out how to fix this, would someone please be able to help.
Also, sometimes you get it where it says the same thing multipal times when you actually join the chat.
This is what happens: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/xerh4.png[/img]
Let me know if you can help, please and thanks.

item.title: Help with cc glitch please
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“3p1c sk1ll3r, post:9, topic:397994”][quote author=runewings317 link=topic=495123.msg3620074#msg3620074 date=1307322378]

Still looking for help… Kids don’t help when they don’t explain and decide to use offensive language…
[/quote]Shit isn’t offensive unless you pure amish. And no offense, but if you can’t understand what I’m saying then you might as well give up RS-PS. And if your owner can’t do it either he might as well give up too. Just search the freaking log in message into client.java and look for something that would indicate that you would automatically join the clan chat “Market”. If you don’t understand that then give up…

I’ll let him know. I don’t know how to code a server… I’ve come here to learn… I’ll have him try it and see what he finds.[/quote]Ok. I hope I helped. If you need any more help just ask me. I can try to find more possible ways to fix the glitch but I’m pretty sure thats how.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with cc glitch please
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“3p1c sk1ll3r, post:3, topic:397994”]Uhmm, did you not read?

You login on the server, and it automatically puts you into the “Market” clan chat, you cannot talk because it say’s you’re not in it, When you try to leave it says “You’re not in a clan”, when you join it, everything everyone says is either double or more.[/quote]Don’t be an idiot… Theres NOTHING in the description that tells what the glitch is. All it says is it auto makes you enter this cc. Anyway… Look for something in your log in method for clan chat shit. To find this type in your log in message to client.java via search box.

Read full topic
